original_title: Piss on You: Winnipeg’s Early Punk Scene
overview: Thirty-six years in the making, Kathryn Martin's Piss On You documents the early Winnipeg punk scene, a wild and tumultuous time steeped in mud, blood, and beer, an era of noise and fury unlike anything the city has seen before or since. Featuring performances by the Unwanted, Stranded, and Gramma Lamma, the DVD release also includes appearances by members of Personality Crisis, the Stretch Marks, the Unwanted, Nostrils, Ruggedy Annes, Dub Rifles, and the Manic Depressors.
title: Piss on You: Winnipeg’s Early Punk Scene
